title: AssemblyInfo.cs how to generate with BOM?
body:
_From @Looooopy on March 14, 2017 15:29_

Is it possible to generate a AssemblyInfo.cs with BOM?

I have stylecop analyzers that complain on the generated AssemblyInfo.cs and do not want to turn it of.
For now i have set it to down from error to a warning so i can compile the project.

_Copied from original issue: dotnet/sdk#989_

nodes.body:
_From @dasMulli on March 24, 2017 8:26_

Suggest moving this to MSBuild where the responsible Task comes from
(https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/xplat/src/Tasks/WriteCodeFragment.cs)

Closing as a duplicate of #1925 since that has an outstanding PR. Please comment if you think that being able to specify a BOM is critical and it's not sufficient to add the `<auto-generated>` tag and we can reconsider this.
